moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather Avira Password Extraction
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module extracts the weakly hashed password
          which is used to protect a Avira Antivirus (<= 15.0.17.273) installation.
author: Robert Kugler / robertchrk

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
